properties.name: Tatsiana Zhehala
properties.esd activity areas: University Education, Environmental Sustainability Issues, Social Sustainability Issues
properties.keywords: I am a participant and active assistant developer of CLIL (Content and Language Integrated Learning), which is currently being implemented into University Curriculum. This bilingual educational approach involves teaching curriculum subject through the medium of a language still being learned. As a CLIL teacher, I provide the necessary language support alongside the subject specialism. The subject I am developing and implementing in English is Environmental Monitoring, where the focus should be not only on content and not only on language. Each is interwoven.
